Posts.Content: I too stopped taking meds. There is more of a risk of uterine cancer than blocking further breast cancer. That is what the documentation that comes with the meds says, anyway. I suppose if I had a hysterectomy, I wouldn't have to worry about it, but even with estrogen and progesterone positive breast cancer, my oncologist said that insurance won't pay for it because it isn't medically necessary.
Posts.Title: Triple Negative - No Chemo????
